mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_report( report_id, member_id, report_type_cd, report_title, report_content, report_date ) VALUES ( #{reportId}, #{memberId}, #{reportTypeCd}, #{reportTitle}, #{reportContent}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_report r JOIN tb_member m ON m.member_id = r.member_id
WHERE r.member_id = #{sessionId}

SELECT r.report_no, r.report_id, r.member_id, t.report_type_nm, r.report_title, r.report_content, r.report_date, a.approve_state_nm, r.report_approve_date, r.report_approve_reason, r.admin_id FROM tb_report r JOIN tb_approve_state a ON r.approve_state_cd = a.approve_state_cd JOIN tb_report_type t ON r.report_type_cd = t.report_type_cd WHERE r.report_no = #{reportNo}
